dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's shift to a cashless economy is just exploding, and Kaspi.kz is right at the center of it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's shift to a cashless economy is just exploding, and the website is right at the center of it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Driven by Kaspi.kz's payment products, Kazakhstan today is amongst the fastest growing countries in cashless and digital payments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, they've got over 6.5 million users on that mobile app—it's like everyone in the country is using it for everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, they've got over six point five million users on that mobile app-it's like everyone in the country is using it for everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we shared how our team is revolutionizing the way people pay, shop and manage their personal finances with our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users and has become an integral part of their daily lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're not just about payments, right? They're pushing hard into SME financing too. They loaned out 2.5 billion tenge in just two months!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're not just about payments, right? They're pushing hard into S M E financing too. They loaned out two point five billion tenge in just two months!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 2 billion tenge has already been provided to SMEs to help fund their growth in just the last two months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's wild. And they're putting in all these POS terminals—like, 20,500 already, and aiming for 36,000 this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's wild. And they're putting in all these P O S terminals-like, twenty thousand, five hundred already, and aiming for thirty six thousand this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of 2019, Kaspi.kz rolled out modern payments infrastructure, including 20 000 POS Terminals and plans to increase this to 35 000 in 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Vyacheslav Kim mentioned their whole pivot from being just a retail bank to becoming this massive tech platform. It's a huge transformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Vyacheslav Kim mentioned their whole pivot from being just a retail bank to becoming this massive tech platform. It's a huge transformation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we discussed our transformation from a leading retail bank into the country's largest technology platform and mobile ecosystem commented Vyacheslav Kim, Chairman of the Board of Directors of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You can tell they're thinking long-term. Even their IPO plans—New York and Astana exchanges. That's ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You can tell they're thinking long-term. Even their I P O plans-New York and Astana exchanges. That's ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The founders of Kaspi.kz also updated the President on Kaspi.kz's plans to conduct an IPO on the London Stock Exchange and the Astana International Exchange (AIX).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the government's backing them too—that three-year tax break for small businesses? Huge support for the ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the government's backing them too-that three-year tax break for small businesses? Huge support for the ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz founders expressed gratitude to the President on behalf of entrepreneurs for providing a 3-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze said their mission is literally to improve people's lives through tech. It sounds lofty, but with those numbers, you kinda believe it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikhail Lomtadze said their mission is literally to improve people's lives through tech. It sounds lofty, but with those numbers, you kinda believe it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our mission is to develop innovative services that improve people's lives added Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And partnering with over 12,500 companies… they're building an entire economy around this app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And partnering with over twelve thousand, five hundred companies... they're building an entire economy around this app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz founders shared the company's plans to continue growing services around its partners, which include over 12 000 companies across various sectors of economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like they've created this digital ecosystem that's just… unavoidable. In a good way!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like they've created this digital ecosystem that's just... unavoidable. In a good way!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the President acknowledging their role in national innovation—that's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the President acknowledging their role in national innovation-that's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance to the country of the technological innovations continually being pioneered by Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. You don't often see a fintech company driving national policy like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. You don't often see a fintech company driving national policy like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what's next for them. With that kind of momentum, sky's the limit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what's next for them. With that kind of momentum, sky's the limit.
